Package ca.utoronto.utm.strategies

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircleStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Circle objects.
    EraserStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Squiggle objects that act as erasers.
    PolygonStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Polygon (extends Polyline) objects.
    PolylineStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Polyline object.
    RectangleStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Rectangle objects.
    ShapeFactory
    A factory pattern that creates Shape Strategy classes based on given parameters.
    ShapeManipulatorStrategy
    Abstract class that every Shape Strategy class extends.
    SquareStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Square objects.
    SquiggleStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Squiggle objects.
